duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage handscoring contracts, scheduling, and resource planning for multiple science projects.
Develop item-specific training and coordinate with project managers to ensure projects are ready for active scoring.
Manage a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers during active scoring.
Apply science expertise in item development, scoring process, and meetings with clients and educators.
Communicate with various roles daily using different channels and work in a team environment.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in their roles and science item scoring.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
